item.title: The Addams Family Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele. Key of Bb.
Chords Used: Bb, Cm, F. Finger picking/TAB included.
As heard on The Addams Family
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE & Bass): https://youtu.be/jy5lUe66E-k
******************** Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion.
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource). Also on social media: Twitter (@UkeStuff) and Instagram (@ukestuff.info).

Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Steven Universe - We Are the Crystal Gems
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA Ukulele. Keys of F & G.
Chords Used: F, A7, Bb, C, Bbm, Gm7, Am7, Bbm7, E7, Am, Dm, G, Cmaj7, D7, C7, B7, Cm, Em, Gmaj7
As performed on Steven Universe
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/pdzcOAduI8E
******************** Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion.

item.title: Grace VanderWaal - Escape My Mind
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Escape My Mind - Grace VanderWaal
Using the chords: C Cm Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: DU DU DU DU Note play du DU du DU - captials have more accent
This video is meant for educational purposes and ukulele lessons.
No copyright infringement intended.

item.title: Taron Egerton - I'm Still Standing
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Cm and C. Raised a whole step from the original (Bbm and Bb). This is an updated video, just for the intro slide and the description. Sadly, you cannot update a video with a new version on YouTube. I left a link to this video on the original video.
As performed by Taron Egerton in “Sing.” I had originally had Taron Egerton's name wrong, and a number of people wrote comments to complain about it.
My boys enjoyed Sing and frequently sing this song. I had started working on but moved on to other videos. Katie Denure (One Music School) posted a tutorial today (https://youtu.be/m_Xoe9g00oc), which inspired me to wrap up this video. I took away some of the fast Ab Bb C changes that occur at the end of some phrases...feel free to add them back in your own practice. This video offers some good Barre chord practice (partial and full) with Cm, Ab, and Bb.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Visit the sister ukulele channel to this channel, YouTube.com/ukestuff

item.title: Eric Clapton - Tears in Heaven
item.description:
For educational use.
Chords Used: F, C, Dm Bb, A, Gm, Cm, D, C7
Tears in Heaven by Eric Clapton. This version does not have the bridge. It’s been lowered by 4 semitones to the key of C so beginner ukulele students can play along. Some of the more complex chords have been simplified or skipped.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Dawn - Tie a Yellow Ribbon Round the Ole Oak Tree
item.description: Performed by Tony Orlando & Dawn Written by Irwin Levine & L. Russel Brown

item.title: Jerry Duplessis - Lemonade - Alex Boye
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Lemonade on the ukulele by Alex Boye. The chords used are G C D B7 Am Bm7 Cm Em.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Michael Bublé - Someday
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Someday on the ukulele by Michael Bublé and Meghan Trainor. The chords used are G C D Am Em7 plus an optional Uke 2 part that uses A B Cm.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Vince Guaraldi Trio - Linus and Lucy
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Linus and Lucy on the ukulele by The Vince Guaraldi Trio. The chords used are C F G Cm. Original in Ab.
*This is an edited version that repeats the main theme and takes out the rest of the song. This is NOT the full version.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Wiz Khalifa - See You Again - Universal Pictures Film Music
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play See You Again on the ukulele by Wiz Khalifa and Charlie Puth. The chords used are Bb Eb F Cm Gm. In the Key of C https://youtu.be/uQ-EltSVFe4.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
